name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Python Engineer with 13+ years of expertise in developing scalable applications with a strong focus on **Python**, **FastAPI**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **RESTful API**. Demonstrated proficiency in deploying cloud solutions on **AWS**, **Azure**, and **Google Cloud**, ensuring high availability and performance. Solid understanding of asynchronous programming with **Asyncio**, and managing databases with **PostgreSQL**. Skilled in messaging systems like **RabbitMQ** and caching solutions using **Redis**.
Proficient in implementing monitoring and observability tools, including **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **ELK**, and **Loki**. Proven ability to create AI/ML-powered applications with experience in building platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning projects with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. A well-rounded developer experienced in both frontend and backend frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, and **Django**, as well as CI/CD methodologies.
